span.span: Implements the RegisterAssembly task.

summary.span: Use the RegisterAssembly element in your project file to create and execute this task.

span.span: Use the RegisterAssembly element in your project file to create and execute this task.

summary.span: For usage and parameter information, see [RegisterAssembly Task](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ba5f19ac-6764-4d28-9b79-a86de58f8987).

span.span: For usage and parameter information, see [RegisterAssembly Task](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ba5f19ac-6764-4d28-9b79-a86de58f8987).

remarks.format: ## Remarks Framework64 /\<版本 > / RegisterAssemblyTask 无法解析注册为 32 位组件的 COM 对象的库。Framework64/\/RegisterAssemblyTask cannot resolve a library of COM objects registered as 32-bit components. Framework /\<版本 > / RegisterAssemblyTask 无法解析注册为 64 位组件的 COM 对象的库。Framework/\/RegisterAssemblyTask cannot resolve a library of COM objects registered as 64-bit components. 例如，如果你注册的 COM 对象作为 64 位计算机上的 32 位组件调用 ClassLibrary1 库、 运行 Visual Studio 中，并将目标更改为 x64，生成失败并出现以下错误：For example, if you register a library of COM objects called ClassLibrary1 as 32-bit components on a 64-bit machine, run Visual Studio, and change the target to x64, the build fails with the following error: `ClassLibrary1.dll is not a valid assembly`

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果随后将安装要注册到全局程序集缓存中的程序集，则不应指定此选项。You should not specify this option if you will subsequently install the assembly that you are registering into the global assembly cache.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ TypeLibFiles { cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <Microsoft::Build::Framework::ITaskItem ^> ^ value); };
member this.TypeLibFiles : Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem[] with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the type library to generate from the specified assembly.

span.span: Gets or sets the type library to generate from the specified assembly.

value.span: 要从指定的程序集中生成的类型库。

span.span: The type library to generate from the specified assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 生成的类型库包含此程序集中定义的可访问类型的定义。The generated type library contains definitions of the accessible types defined within the assembly. 仅在下列情况之一成立时才会生成此类型库：The type library is only generated if one of the following is true: - 在该位置不存在该名称的类型库。A type library of that name does not exist at that location. - 类型库存在，但它是早于正在传递的程序集。A type library exists but it is older than the assembly being passed in. 如果类型库比要传递的程序集新，则不会创建新的类型库，但仍会注册程序集。If the type library is newer than the assembly being passed, a new one will not be created, but the assembly will still be registered. 如果指定此属性，它必须具有相同数量的项作为属性或任务将失败。If this property is specified, it must have the same number of items as the property or the task will fail. 如果未指定输入，任务会默认使用程序集的名称，并将项的扩展名更改为 .tlb。If no inputs are specified, the task will default to the name of the assembly and change the extension of the item to .tlb.
